Articles.Content:
Friends, I have just published the long-awaited v2 upgrade to the venerable Minotaur Super Tanker at KerbalX [link].

 

 

The Minotaur v2: it chops, it dices, it slices, it mulches, it mows the lawn, it walks the dog -- and it boosts 39 kilo-kallons of LF to LKO.  [It does not play the piano.]

And now with nosecones!!  (Ja, Werner was right all along...)

It has the grunt and an ample top deck for heavy-lifting of additional payload.    It can go inter-planetary.  You can even build a super-ugly orbital gas station unpainted in a dull, orange, anti-knock safety color (thoroughly tested by Kerbals) from the first two you send up [subject of next video].  It has a power train for Massive Ion Drive.

Get yours now as there are only a virtual number remaining...

Edited March 4, 2018 by Hotel26
